nodes.name: validateRSASHA256Signature

devdoc.details: Library implementing the signature validation with ASN.1 DER public keys

validateRSASHA1Signature(bytes,bytes,byt.details: Parses publix key, hashes message, and validates signature

params.message: Bytes string that was hashed and signed
params.signerPubKey: Public key used to create the signature

validateRSASHA1Signature(bytes,bytes,byt.return: true if validation was successful and signature is valid, false otherwise

validateRSASHA256Signature(bytes,bytes,b.details: Parses publix key, hashes message, and validates signature

params.message: Bytes string that was hashed and signed
params.signerPubKey: Public key used to create the signature

validateRSASHA256Signature(bytes,bytes,b.return: true if validation was successful and signature is valid, false otherwise

validateSignature(bytes,bytes,bytes,byte.details: The correct signature algorithm is retrieved and, if supported, the signature is verified

params.message: Bytes string that was hashed and signed
params.sigInfo: Description of the signature algorithm used
params.signerPubKey: Public key used to create the signature

validateSignature(bytes,bytes,bytes,byte.return: true if validation was successful and signature is valid, false otherwise

devdoc.title: SignatureValidation

validateRSASHA1Signature(bytes,bytes,byt.notice: Validate the signature of a message produced with RSA-SHA-1

validateRSASHA256Signature(bytes,bytes,b.notice: Validate the signature of a message produced with RSA-SHA-256

validateSignature(bytes,bytes,bytes,byte.notice: Validate the signature of a message produced with any supported signature algorithm
